casebody.data:
TORRES
v.
CONCRETE DESIGNS, INC. 2019-0953 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 31, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On appellees' notice of pending App.R. 26 applications and motion for stay of proceedings. Motion for stay of proceedings granted. The parties shall notify this court forthwith after the decision by the Cuyahoga County Court of Appeals on the pending App.R. 26 applications.
